definition: to give classes/to work as a teacher
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: The books are arranged by course number and instructor.
sentences.chinese: 所有的书都按照课程编号和任课老师来排序的。

sentences.english: Detention 15 minutes administered by classroom teacher at location and time of choice.
sentences.chinese: 思过15分钟，由任课教师决定时间和地点。

sentences.english: Apart from classroom, in-depth study of ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 任课之余，深入研究古汉语。

sentences.english: My course instructor also gave me a positive appraisal.
sentences.chinese: 我的任课老师也给予了肯定的评价。

sentences.english: Instructors shall insure that all classes begin punctually, and utilize the entire time allotted for the class.
sentences.chinese: 任课教师需按时上下课，并有效地利用课堂教学时间。

sentences.english: Find your a lesson the teacher, think that the way persuade him to give you the score of exaltation.
sentences.chinese: 去找你的任课老师，想法说服他给你提高分数。

sentences.english: Why not let the teacher in charge teacher and their key to make up a missed lesson?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不让班主任和任课老师给他们重点补课？

sentences.english: Is there any way for the school to post our teachers' education and teaching experience?
sentences.chinese: 能否让家长知道学校任课老师们的背景资料？

sentences.english: What is the proportion of using Chinese in class in the fifty minutes?
sentences.chinese: 你在上本课时，任课老师是否会使用中文来辅助教学？

definition: to teach as substitute for absent teacher
to teach classes in addition to other duties/to hold several teaching jobs
teacher in charge of a class
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
